title: #2117 - Ray Kurzweil
description: Listen to this episode from The Joe Rogan Experience on Spotify. Ray Kurzweil is a scientist, futurist, and Principal Researcher and AI Visionary at Google. He's the author of numerous books, including the forthcoming title "The Singularity is Nearer." Look for it on June 25, 2024.www.thekurzweillibrary.com Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
